channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024050297
item.description:
Report E-2024050297

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-16T15:11:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-16
  • City: BETTENDORF
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAKOTA MINNESOTA & EASTERN RAI
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 16, 2024, at 19:33, Tank Car IAPX 1141 was observed, during a roll-by inspection, as actively emitting vapor from the top discharge stack. Upon investigation, the vapor valve handle located in the A-R cabinet was found to be slightly opened, with secondary closure turnbuckles and zip ties broken loose from the valve handle. The valve was closed and spare turnbuckles and zip ties (found in the cabinet) were re-applied to the valve for secondary securement. Estimated duration of the release was undeterminable, the vapor valve and associated piping was found frosted.
